quote: One small decision can shape an entire life. Sometimes, if you're lucky, the biggest hardship can lead to your greatest blessing. It just takes time to see that God works in mysterious ways.
quote_letters: ONE SMALL DECISION CAN SHAPE AN ENTIRE LIFE SOMETIMES IF YOURE LUCKY THE BIGGEST HARDSHIP CAN LEAD TO YOUR GREATEST BLESSING IT JUST TAKES TIME TO SEE THAT GOD WORKS IN MYSTERIOUS WAYS
